WorkItem.ClosedComment: yahoomap use MercatorProjectionand PlateCarreeProjection is for ArcGIS. everything is in perfect precision ;}
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

when experimenting the plate carree projection (with a yahoomap map), the points are misplaced on the map.
e.g. - A PointLatLng with lat=0, lng=0 is displayed on latitude 0 and longitude 180 of the map

Besides, a question: Platecarreeprojection and PlatecarreeprojectionPergo only differs on the Tilesize (512 vs. 256): was-it intended?
